tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pseudonymization_orders (
    order_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    pseudonymized_product VARCHAR(50),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE pseudonymized_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  order_date TIMESTAMP,
  pseudonym VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES pseudonymized_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pseudonymized_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  pseudonym VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES pseudonymized_orders(order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pseudonymized_addresses (
  address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  street_address VARCHAR(200),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  postcode VARCHAR(10),
  pseudonym VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES pseudonymized_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pseudonymized_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  pseudonym VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES pseudonymized_users(user_id)
);
